log.asm

Declare a number 

            
.data
    number DW 759

Calculating log (base 2) of a number 

            
.text
    mov ecx, 0
    mov eax, 1
whileLE: cmp eax, number
         jnle endWhileLE
body: add eax, eax
      inc ecx
      jmp whileLE

endWhileLE:	dec ecx
